title: LFT to compete in Tournaments. Role: ADC/Support/Jungle

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hello, I have some spare time from now until i start uni. I would like to join a serious and dedicated team to work towards competing in small tournaments.
I am willing to play all roles but i do like ADC, support or jungle. I was platinum 5 season 4 currently sitting at gold 4 climbing my way back up the ladder. I am able to use all communication programs and I am available to play very often. Please don't hesitate to add me and ask any questions.

IGN: mlg JONO
Age: 18 (19 in may)
Location: Brisbane

Good at various of champs :))  

Kind regards, Jonathan.
